alert.note: Alert for Lee; Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lee and northwestern Phillips Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marvell, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marvell, Moro, Rondo, Aubrey, Haynes, Garret Grove, New Salem, Poplar Grove, Gill, Oak Forest, Westor, Big Creek Corner, Four Forks, Kindall, Turkey Scratch, Vineyard, Kingtown, Thomasville, Trenton and Cypert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
